account_creation_privacy_statement.message: I consent to Ghostery's data practices found in its $LINK_PS_START$Privacy Statement$LINK_PS_END$ and the terms found in its $LINK_UA_START$License Agreement$LINK_UA_END$.

all.description: Default setting in the 'filter by type' dropdown for the tag browser. Doesn't filter anything out. Should read as 'Show all'.

banner_check_your_email_title.message: Please check your email shortly for a link to reset your password.

banner_no_such_account_message.message: Looks like we can't find this email and password combo. Give it another shot.

blacklist_error_whitelist_url.message: This site has been removed from your Trusted Sites list and added to your Restricted Sites list

blocked.description: Select this to show only blocked (checked) tags in the tag browser. Should read as 'Show blocked'.

blocked_redirect_action_always_title.description: Title for the 'Allow always and reload' button on the blocked redirect page.

blocked_redirect_action_through_once_tit.description: Title for the 'Allow once' button on the blocked redirect page.
blocked_redirect_action_through_once_tit.message: Allow tags once until final destination is reached.

blocked_redirect_page_title.description: Page title for blocked_redirect.html which appears when a redirect is blocked.

blocked_redirect_prevent.description: Text appearing on block_redirect.html when a redirect is blocked. Should appear inside "redirect-prevent" div.
blocked_redirect_prevent.message: Ghostery prevented a redirect from $BREAK$ $SP_O_START$$ORIGIN$$SP_END$ to $SP_D_START$$DESTINATION$$SP_END$, $BREAK$which is part of $A_START$$APP$$A_END$. $BREAK$

blocked_redirect_url_content.description: Text appearing on block_redirect.html when a redirect is blocked and a final 'destination' URL is successfully found.
blocked_redirect_url_content.message: This tag appears to redirect to $BREAK$ $A_START$$REDIRECT_URL$$A_END$ If this link looks right and you'd like to proceed, click on the icon below to allow $APP$ and reload.

button_cancel.description: Part of a confirmation dialog. Clicking this cancels the action.

category_advertising.description: Ghostery organizes tags by category. This is one of several tag categories.

category_advertising_desc.description: User-facing description for the Advertising tag category.
category_advertising_desc.message: Includes advertising services such as data collection, behavioral analysis or retargeting.

category_audio_video_player.description: Ghostery organizes tags by category. This is one of several tag categories.

category_audio_video_player_desc.description: User-facing description for the Audio/Video Player tag category.
category_audio_video_player_desc.message: Enables websites to publish, distribute, and optimize audio and video content.

category_comments.description: Ghostery organizes tags by category. This is one of several tag categories.

category_comments_desc.description: User-facing description for the Comments tag category.
category_comments_desc.message: Enables comment sections for articles and product reviews.

category_customer_interaction.description: Ghostery organizes tags by category. This is one of several tag categories.

category_customer_interaction_desc.description: User-facing description for the Customer Interaction tag category.
category_customer_interaction_desc.message: Includes chat, email messaging, customer support, and other interaction tools.

category_essential.description: Ghostery organizes tags by category. This is one of several tag categories.

category_essential_desc.description: User-facing description for the Essential tag category.
category_essential_desc.message: Includes trackers critical to website functionality such as tag managers and privacy notices.

category_pornvertising.description: Ghostery organizes tags by category. This is one of several tag categories.

category_pornvertising_desc.description: User-facing description for the Adult Advertising tag category.
category_pornvertising_desc.message: Includes advertising technologies designed for adult content sites.

category_site_analytics.description: Ghostery organizes tags by category. This is one of several tag categories.

category_site_analytics_desc.description: User-facing description for the Site Analytics tag category.
category_site_analytics_desc.message: Includes data analytics, site usage and performance trackers.

category_social_media.description: Ghostery organizes tags by category. This is one of several tag categories.

category_social_media_desc.description: User-facing description for the Social Media tag category.
category_social_media_desc.message: Includes features related to social media platforms.

category_uncategorized_desc.message: These trackers have not been categorized yet.

click2play_allow_always_tooltip.description: Tooltip that appears over the 'allow always' click2play button.

click2play_allow_once_button_tooltip.description: Tooltip that appears over the click2play replacement for 'social' buttons.
click2play_allow_once_button_tooltip.message: Ghostery blocked $APP_NAME$. Click here to allow it to load just this once.

click2play_allow_once_tooltip.description: Tooltip that appears over the 'allow once' click2play button.

copyright.description: Copyright message, shown in page footers.

company_address.example: GHOSTERY, Inc., Such-and-such Street, Such-and-such Floor, New York, NY, Zip Code

error_email_forgot.message: Hmm, I can’t find that email. Maybe try another?

forgot_password_message.message: Forgot your password? Hey, it happens to everyone. We'll email you instructions to reset your password.

invalid_email_forgot.message: Sorry, you have to enter a real email address.

invalid_email_login.message: Sorry, you have to enter a real email address.

none.description: Used to say that this item does not belong to any of the groups, as in "Groups: None" (as opposed to "Groups: Group A, Group B, Group C").

summary_description_not_scanned_2.message: Navigate to another page and I promise I'll deliver the goods.

summary_resume_ghostery_tooltip.message: Ghostery extension paused. Click to resume.

panel_email_verification_sent.message: $BOLD_HTML_STARTS$ Success! $BOLD_HTML_END$ An account verification email has been sent to $EMAIL$

panel_about_release_notes.message: See release notes for all updates

panel_click_to_reload.message: Click to reload and see changes.

panel_tracker_total_tooltip.message: Total count of trackers found, ads blocked and data points anonymized.

panel_signin_success.message: You are now signed in as

panel_signin_success_title.message: Congrats! Your Ghostery account is ready to go.

panel_detail_rewards_cliqz_text.message: Feature already active in the Cliqz MyOffrz control panel.

notification_upgrade.message: Our dedicated and uncommonly attractive team has worked hard to release a new version of Ghostery.

notification_upgrade_link.message: Check out the sweet new features and defect fixes in this release.

notification_upgrade_v8.message: Set up our cool new features and learn about our biggest release yet.

notification_library_update.message: We've unearthed some new trackers and added them to the Ghostery Database.

password_characters_requirements.message: Only these special characters are allowed: !@#$%^&*=+()<>{}[];:,./?

server_error_message.message: We seem to be having a technical issue. Try again later.

email_address_in_use.message: That email address is already in use.  Please choose another.

short_description.description: A short description of this extension (Ghostery).
short_description.message: Ghostery is a powerful privacy extension. Block ads, stop trackers and speed up websites.

unblocked.description: Select this to show only unblocked (unchecked) tags in the tag browser. Should read as 'Show unblocked'.

whitelist_error_blacklist_url.message: This site has been removed from your Restricted Sites list and added to your Trusted Sites list.

whitelist_error_duplicate_url.description: Options page site whitelisting error message shown when whitelisting a URL that is already in the whitelist.

settings_auto_update.message: Enable automatic updates from the Ghostery tracker library

settings_update_failed.message: Update failed. Please try again later

settings_required_trackers.message: Show me when I need to allow a tracker to use a site's features

settings_replace_social.message: Replace blocked social media buttons with a Ghostery icon

settings_individual_trackers.message: Trust and Restrict individual trackers on a site

settings_allow_trackers.message: Allow trackers created by site owners

settings_block_trackers.message: Block new trackers added to Ghostery by default

settings_show_purple_box.message: Show the purple box in the corner of my browser

settings_hide_alert_trusted.message: Hide the purple box on trusted websites

settings_new_trackers.message: Adds new trackers to its tracker library

settings_show_reload_banner.message: Show page reload banner notifications at the top of the extension

settings_show_trackers_banner.message: Show tracker alert banner notifications at the top of the extension

settings_show_tracker_count_badge.message: Show tracker count badge on the Ghostery icon in browser toolbar

settings_sign_create_text.message: Settings from your account will sync to this device. Create an account to easily sync your Ghostery settings across all devices and platforms.

settings_export_text.message: Save a copy of the Ghostery preferences and transfer to another computer.

settings_export_success.message: Your settings have been successfully exported to your downloads folder on

settings_export_error.message: Your settings were not successfully exported. Please try again.

settings_export_reserved_page_error.message: Ghostery cannot export settings when the current page is one of the reserved browser pages. Please navigate to a different page and try again.

settings_import_warning.message: WARNING: This will overwrite your current Ghostery settings.

settings_import_success.message: Your settings have been successfully imported on

settings_import_dialog_error.message: Ghostery cannot display browse dialog when the current page is one of the reserved browser pages. Please navigate to a different page and try again.

settings_import_file_error.message: That is the incorrect file type. Please choose a .ghost file and try again.

not_http_page.message: Ensure that your current tab has http or https page opened

settings_show_patterns_tooltip.message: Tracker URLs can be found below the tracker description after clicking on a tracker.

settings_highlight_trackers_tooltip.message: Sometimes features like social media sharing, comments, or video players won't work when a certain tracker is blocked. If you want to enable one of these blocked features, click this icon on the page:

settings_individual_trackers_tooltip.message: Choose which specific trackers to always trust or always restrict on a specific website.

settings_allow_trackers_tooltip.message: For example, blocking a Facebook tracker on facebook.com might break the site.

settings_show_purple_box_tooltip.message: The purple box is a real-time list of trackers that is displayed in the corner of your browser. This feature will help you see trackers as they are added onto a webpage.

settings_notify_me_tooltip.message: Allow Ghostery to show messages in my browser related to new product features, updates, and customer feedback.

settings_share_usage_tooltip.message: We collect usage analytics to better understand what features users like. For example, if you click pause, we will collect a ping letting us know you used that feature.

settings_human_web_tooltip.message: Ghostery now implements the Human Web by default, a revolutionary technology that uses the wisdom of the crowd to build a more private internet

settings_offers_tooltip.message: Ghostery Rewards is a private-by-design feature that delivers you discounts and special offers from our partner companies as you browse.

settings_trusted_sites_description.message: Sites listed here will be trusted with all trackers unblocked.

settings_restricted_sites_description.message: Sites listed here will be restricted with all trackers blocked.

drawer_tooltip_enable_anti_tracking.message: Anonymize unblocked and unknown trackers for greater browsing protection

drawer_desc_enable_anti_tracking.message: Private data points have been removed.

drawer_tooltip_enable_ad_block.message: Block advertisements on websites you visit

drawer_tooltip_enable_smart_block.message: Automatically block and unblock trackers to optimize page performance

drawer_desc_enable_smart_block.message: Trackers have been temporarily blocked or unblocked.

alert_anti_track_on.message: Enhanced Anti-Tracking ON. Personal data will be anonymized.

alert_anti_track_off.message: Enhanced Anti-Tracking OFF. Personal data will not be anonymized.

alert_ad_block_on.message: Enhanced Ad-Blocking ON. Advertisements will be blocked.

alert_ad_block_off.message: Enhanced Ad-Blocking OFF. Advertisements will not be blocked.

alert_smart_block_on.message: Smart Blocking ON. Tracker blocking will be adjusted to optimize page performance.

alert_smart_block_off.message: Smart Blocking OFF. Tracker blocking will not be automatically adjusted.

alert_site_trusted.message: Site whitelisted. Trackers will be allowed and Anti-Tracking disabled on this site.

alert_site_restricted.message: Site blacklisted. Trackers will be blocked and Anti-Tracking enabled on this site.

tooltip_anti_track_body.message: Anonymize personal data for greater protection.

tooltip_body_in_cliqz.message: Feature already active in Cliqz by default.

tooltip_smart_block_body.message: Automatically block and unblock trackers to optimize page performance.

tooltip_smart_block_body_on.message: Tracker blocking adjusted to optimize page performance.

tooltip_trust.message: Always allow trackers & disable Anti-Tracking on this site.

tooltip_trust_on.message: Trackers allowed and Anti-Tracking disabled on site. Click to Undo.

tooltip_restrict.message: Always block trackers & protect my personal data on this site.

tooltip_restrict_on.message: Trackers blocked and Anti-Tracking enabled on site. Click to Undo.

setup_choice_view_title.message: Browse smarter with Ghostery! $BR$How would you like to begin?

setup_choice_view_share_data.message: Participate in Ghostery Rewards and share Human Web & analytics data.

setup_choice_view_share_data_no_human_we.message: Share my analytics data to improve Ghostery’s performance.

setup_choice_view_answer_questions.message: Choose my own settings by answering a few short questions.

setup_choice_view_legal.message: By installing Ghostery, you agree to Ghostery's $LINK_PP_START$Privacy Policy$LINK_PP_END$ and $LINK_TERMS_START$Terms of Use$LINK_TERMS_END$.

setup_blocking_view_title.message: Ghostery can block trackers to make your browsing cleaner, faster, and safer. What would you like to block?

setup_additional_view_title.message: Would you like to browse smarter with our recommended features?

setup_additional_view_antitrack_desc.message: Anonymize unblocked and unknown trackers for greater browsing protection.

setup_additional_view_adblock_desc.message: Block all advertisements on websites you visit.

setup_feature_active_in_cliqz.message: This feature already active in Cliqz by default. $LINK_START$Learn more.$LINK_END$

setup_additional_view_smartblock_desc.message: Automatically block and unblock trackers to optimize page performance.

setup_display_view_detailed_desc.message: Lists trackers and allows custom blocking with additional insights.

setup_login_view_title.message: Would you like to create a Ghostery account to sync settings across browsers and devices?

setup_login_view_email_error.message: Sorry, you have to enter a real email address.

setup_login_view_create_account.message: Don't have an account? Create one.

setup_login_view_log_in.message: Already have an account? Sign in.

setup_data_view_title.message: Would you like to support Ghostery?

setup_data_view_desc.message: We use anonymous analytics and Human Web data to improve Ghostery’s performance, and provide Rewards without collecting any personal data. $LINK_START$Learn more$LINK_END$.

setup_data_view_desc_no_human_web.message: We use anonymous analytics data to improve Ghostery’s performance, without collecting any personal data. $LINK_START$Learn more$LINK_END$.

setup_data_view_checkbox.message: Support Ghostery by sharing this information.

setup_done_view_desc.message: Ghostery will quietly live here in your browser bar.

setup_footer_license.message: Ghostery$COPY$ is a Cliqz company. Learn more about $LINK_START$Cliqz$LINK_END$. $COPY$Cliqz International GmbH, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Cliqz GmbH. All rights reserved.

setup_upgrade_desc_1.message: $BOLD_START$Smart Blocking$BOLD_END$ automatically optimizes performance as you browse.

setup_upgrade_desc_2.message: $BOLD_START$Dynamic UI$BOLD_END$ gives you multiple display options.

setup_upgrade_desc_3.message: $BOLD_START$Enhanced Anti-Tracking$BOLD_END$ further protects your personal data.

hub_home_header_tagline.message: You are now protected with our default settings.

hub_home_header_checkbox_label.message: Share additional anonymous analytics data to improve Ghostery’s performance.

hub_home_header_info.message: New users are opted in to participating in Human Web and Ghostery Rewards. You may change these settings in custom setup or in the extension.

hub_home_feature_setup_text.message: Edit your settings and blocking preferences.

hub_home_feature_supporter_text.message: Become a Ghostery Supporter and unlock special features.

hub_setup_header_title_blocking.message: Ghostery can block trackers to make your browsing cleaner, faster, and safer.$NEW_LINE$What would you like to block?

hub_setup_header_title_antisuite.message: Would you like to browse smarter with our recommended features?

hub_setup_header_title_humanweb.message: Would you like to help improve Ghostery?

hub_setup_enter_modal_text.message: Entering custom setup will override your previous Ghostery settings. Do you want to continue?

hub_setup_blocking_description_recommend.message: Advertising, Site Analytics, and Adult Advertising trackers blocked

hub_setup_antisuite_description_antitrac.message: Anonymize unblocked and unknown trackers for greater browsing protection.

hub_setup_adblock_description_adblocking.message: Block advertisements on websites you visit.

hub_setup_smartblocking_description_smar.message: Automatically block and unblock trackers to optimize page performance.

hub_setup_ghosteryrewards_description_re.message: Unlock special offers as you browse and make purchases without sharing any data.

hub_setup_humanweb_header.message: We use anonymous Human Web data to improve Ghostery’s performance. No personal data is ever collected. $LINK_LM_START$Learn More$LINK_LM_END$

hub_setup_humanweb_label.message: Support Ghostery by sharing this information

hub_setup_feature_supporter_description.message: Support Ghostery and unlock special perks.

hub_setup_feature_products_description.message: Protect yourself fully with our full privacy suite!

hub_products_page_title.message: Ghostery Hub - Try Other Ghostery Products

hub_products_header_description.message: Stay protected and enhance your online experience with the our full privacy suite.

hub_products_main_promo_description.message: Browse ad-and tracker free on the go with our updated and enhanced mobile browser. Now equipped with a private search engine!

hub_products_second_promo_description.message: Search privately, view tracker stats, and manage Rewards with our new tab feature. Coming soon!

hub_products_third_promo_description.message: Protect your online privacy and get rid of ads with our lightest product yet, exclusively for Safari.

hub_rewards_header_description.message: Our new Rewards feature offers a powerful, completely private new way to receive real discounts online. Turn it on and check it out!

hub_rewards_experience_description.message: High-value rewards delivered straight to you as you browse and make purchases

hub_rewards_privacy_description.message: No personal data collected, profiles built, or usage of third parties

hub_rewards_relevant_description.message: Specialized offers are timely, relevant, and exclusive for our users

hub_rewards_closer.message: You can turn on Ghostery Rewards in the extension through custom setup.

hub_supporter_header_description.message: Show your support and unlock special perks!

hub_supporter_perk_themes_description.message: Customize the Ghostery colors - try our Midnight theme!

hub_supporter_perk_support_description.message: Resolve issues fast with our Priority help desk service

hub_supporter_perk_more_description.message: Stay tuned for cool features to come

hub_supporter_manifesto.message: We at Ghostery strive to deliver the best privacy protection services to our users free of cost. While we do not charge for our privacy suite, you may choose to support us through a small monthly subscription. Join us in our mission by becoming a Supporter - and unlock some cool perks along the way!

hub_supporter_feature_theme_description.message: Customize the Ghostery colors for a new visual experience! Introduced through popular request. Check out our special Midnight theme, and more to come.

hub_supporter_feature_support_descriptio.message: Need assistance? Find a broken page? Have your questions answered and issues resolved fast with our Priority help desk service, accessible only when signed in with a Supporter account.

hub_supporter_feature_more_description.message: Stay tuned for other cool features and insights as we continue to make your Ghostery experience enjoyable.

rewards_disable_notification.message: Ghostery Rewards is now off. You can always turn it on in your Settings or the Rewards dashboard.

rewards_first_prompt.message: Would you like to continue to your Ghostery Reward?

rewards_second_prompt.message: Would you like to opt out of future Ghostery Rewards?

subscribe_pitch.message: We work hard to keep Ghostery's privacy protection free for all our users. If you like what we do, you can support us with a small subscription of $$2 per month.

subscribe_pitch_sign_here.message: Already a Ghostery Supporter? Sign in here
